title: Ladakh 3 days tour
description: This 3-day tour of Ladakh takes you to some of the most stunning and remote places in the Himalayas. You'll visit Pangong Tso, Nubra Valley, and Leh, and experience the unique culture and landscape of this region.
additionalInformation: This tour is suitable for all fitness levels. The tour is operated in small groups, so you'll get personalized attention from your guide.
cancellationPolicy: Full refund if cancelled 30 days or more in advance. 50% refund if cancelled 15-29 days in advance. No refund if cancelled less than 14 days in advance.

itinerary.description: Arrival in Leh. Check into your hotel and rest for the day. In the evening, visit the Leh Palace and Shanti Stupa.
Drive to Pangong Tso, a stunning high-altitude lake. Spend the day exploring the lake and its surroundings.
Visit Nubra Valley, a remote valley known for its sand dunes and Buddhist monasteries. Spend the day exploring the valley and its villages.

title: Spiti Valley 2-day adventure trip
description: This 2-day adventure trip to Spiti Valley will take you to some of the most stunning and remote places in the Himalayas. You'll visit Kibber, a village known for its beautiful monastery and traditional houses, and Dhankar Monastery, which is perched on a clifftop overlooking the Spiti River.
additionalInformation: This tour is suitable for experienced hikers and trekkers. The tour is operated in small groups, so you'll get personalized attention from your guide.
cancellationPolicy: Full refund if cancelled 30 days or more in advance. 50% refund if cancelled 15-29 days in advance. No refund if cancelled less than 14 days in advance.

itinerary.description: Arrival in Kaza. Check into your hotel and explore the town. In the evening, visit the Hikkim Village, which is home to the world's highest post office.

Take a day trek to Kibber, a village known for its beautiful monastery and traditional houses. On the way back to Kaza, stop at the Dhankar Monastery, which is perched on a clifftop overlooking the Spiti River.

title: Rishikesh Adventure Tour
description: Rishikesh is a popular destination for adventure sports like white river rafting, bungee jumping, and trekking. This 3-day tour takes you to some of the best adventure spots in Rishikesh, and gives you a chance to experience the thrill of these activities.
additionalInformation: This tour is suitable for people of all fitness levels. However, it is important to note that some of the activities, such as white river rafting and trekking, can be physically demanding.
cancellationPolicy: Full refund if cancelled 30 days or more in advance. 50% refund if cancelled 15-29 days in advance. No refund if cancelled less than 14 days in advance.

FAQ.question: What is the difficulty level of this tour?
FAQ.answer: This tour is rated as medium difficulty. There is some hiking and walking involved, but the terrain is not too challenging. However, it is important to note that some of the activities, such as white river rafting and bungee jumping, can be physically demanding.

FAQ.question: What is the weather like in Rishikesh?
FAQ.answer: The weather in Rishikesh varies depending on the time of year. In the summer, the weather is hot and humid, with occasional thunderstorms. In the winter, the weather is mild and sunny. The best time to visit Rishikesh is during the shoulder seasons of spring and autumn, when the weather is pleasant.

itinerary.description: Arrival in Rishikesh. Check into your hotel and rest for the day. In the evening, visit the Lakshman Jhula and Triveni Ghat.
Go white water rafting on the Ganges River. This is a thrilling experience that will take you through some of the most beautiful scenery in Rishikesh.
Go bungee jumping from the Lakshman Jhula bridge. This is a once-in-a-lifetime experience that will give you a rush of adrenaline.
